about_the_game:
"Dragon Conqueror" is an RPG game produced by BanameiR and published by Hanabi games.

Game Content

In a world where dragons have been hunted by humans to the brink of extinction,

Reina, a disciple of the Sword Saint, has been haunted by a nightmare from 15 years ago...

Just as she was about to abandon her search for the truth, she finally discovered information about the appearance of the Black Dragon.

Unable to contain herself any longer, Reina set out on a journey,

one filled with fate, conspiracies, and the path to completing her true self...

Game Features

  • JRPG

  • Puzzle and Escape Mechanics

  • Captivating Storyline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
